description.value:
Activate 1 (concentrate)

This dried-seaweed bracelet is lined with charms shaped like small shark teeth. When you activate the bracelet, attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Escape] using Acrobatics with a +1 item bonus to the check. If you roll a success, you get a critical success instead (if you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead). If you fail the Acrobatics check against a grabbing creature, the creature must either release you as a free action or take @Damage[2d8[piercing]] damage as shark's teeth momentarily emerge from your skin.
